name: MF GHOST
description: Japan adopts self-driving electric automobiles and renders most gas engines obsolete by 202X. The fastest cars find new life in the MFG, a racing circuit held on Japanese motorways. Drivers from around the world race for a shot at the title. Kanata Rivington returns from Britain to Japan for the MFGâ€”and to find his father. Can he win the title and find answers? Buckle up and push it to the limit!
